metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4207 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash component infrastructure in YUI 2.4.0 through 2.8.1, as used in Bugzilla, Moodle, and other products, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to charts/assets/charts.swf.

criterions.comment: loggerhead package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
